Mexico logs biggest meth lab raid under current adminMexican armed forces said on Monday they had dismantled a clandestine meth "mega-laboratory" in northern Sonora state, marking the largest drug laboratory busted under the current administration. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:48:58 GMT DTFGJK6NBZNADI7A7DEOXQPAPY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexico-logs-biggest-meth-lab-raid-under-current-admin-2024-02-12/Reuters世界美洲
IMF warns that any action on Russian assets needs 'sufficient legal support'The International Monetary Fund on Monday warned that any decisions taken about seizing frozen Russian assets should be backed with "sufficient legal support" to avert future risks. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:35:54 GMT D7KMIM32EVIEFE2F2Q3YQAWBCE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/imf-warns-that-any-action- Russian-assets-need-sufficient-legal-support-2024-02-12/Andrea Shalal世界欧洲
Russia uses Zircon hypersonic missile in Ukraine for first time, researchers sayA preliminary analysis concluded that Russia hit Kyiv last week with the hypersonic Zircon missile, its first use in the nearly two-year-old war, the head of a Kyiv research institute said on Monday, presenting a new challenge to Ukraine's air defences. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:23:57 GMT KEIHVVZGMNMNFM2H2X4FQEHEUY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-uses-zircon-hypersonic-missile-ukraine-first-time-researchers-say-2024-02-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Colombia secures $1.2 billion in loans to finance budget, peace plansColombia has reached loan agreements worth more than $1.2 billion with multilateral lenders, the finance ministry said, adding resources will go toward budget items this year and costs associated with peace plans. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:12:54 GMT P3AI2ZFN6JIARGFAIYCU4MRF7A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia-secures-12-billion-loans-finance-budget-peace-plans-2024-02-12/Reuters世界美洲
European powers warn of spike in Russian propaganda before EU electionsFrance, Poland and Germany accused Russia on Monday of putting together an elaborate network of websites to spread pro-Russian propaganda to undermine their governments, warning of a mass spread of such content ahead of EU elections in June. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 19:02:40 GMT OKWVPLFLPVKIZCA4ZHP4GVGAT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/european-powers-warn-spike- Russian-propaganda-before-eu-elections-2024-02-12/John Irish世界欧洲
White House presses Israel to work toward pause in Gaza warThe White House on Monday pressed Israel to work toward a pause in the Gaza conflict to win freedom for more hostages held by Hamas and rapidly increase the flow of humanitarian aid to Palestinian civilians. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 18:51:26 GMT DFQLDFLR4NIPPB5QVUBIGHT3O4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/white-house-presses-israel-work-toward-pause-gaza-war-2024-02-12/Reuters世界中东地区
ICC prosecutor 'deeply concerned' by situation in Gaza's RafahInternational Criminal Court prosecutor Karim Khan said on Monday he was deeply concerned about reports of bombardment and potential ground incursion by Israeli forces in the southern Gaza city of Rafah. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 17:35:17 GMT CZJO3ZPPTVM65L3J6EL6S6ZRW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iccs-prosecutor-deeply-concerned-by-situation-rafah-2024-02-12/Anthony Deutsch世界中东地区
Hamas armed wing says three Israeli hostages killed in Israeli airstrikesHamas' armed wing said on Monday that three of eight Israeli hostages who were seriously injured following Israeli airstrikes had died from their wounds. Dutch government formation still a puzzle 12 weeks after electionEfforts to form a government in the Netherlands are back at square one 12 weeks after an election won by the nationalist Freedom Party (PVV) of anti-Muslim populist Geert Wilders but well short of a majority. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:58:03 GMT JSIADYAHMZNRJE25W2IJVUBK6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-government-formation-still-a-puzzle-12-weeks-after-election-2024-02-12/Bart Meijer世界欧洲
Hundreds of baby sea turtles released off coast of Nicaragua in conservation effortNicaraguan authorities and volunteers released hundreds of tiny baby turtles on the country's Pacific coast over the weekend as part of the government's efforts to protect endangered species. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:39:04 GMT FHY33GJJRZPM7LZULNKVRLYTCU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/hundreds-of-baby-sea-turtles-released-off-coast-nicaragua-conservation-effort-2024-02-12/Maynor Valenzuela世界美洲
Russian oligarch's seized yacht costs $7 million a year to maintain, US saysThe U.S. government said it is spending more than $7 million a year to maintain a superyacht it seized from a sanctioned Russian oligarch, and urged a judge to let it auction the vessel before a dispute over its ownership is resolved. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 16:38:17 GMT RZULL7GQ3BJ3BDMN33RSRSHO5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-oligarchs-seized-yacht-costs-7-million-years-maintain-us-says-2024-02-12/Luc Cohen世界
